verbs.description: < p > [ARG0: U.S. Senator John McCain] [V: rebukes] [ARG1: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-LOC: in a new memoir] , [ARGM-ADV: accusing his fellow Republican of failing to uphold U.S. values by showering praise on international " tyrants , " discrediting the media , ignoring human rights and demeaning] refugees.</p >

< p > U.S. Senator John McCain rebukes President Donald Trump in a new memoir , accusing [ARG1: his fellow Republican] of [V: failing] [ARG2: to uphold U.S. values by showering praise on international " tyrants] , " discrediting the media , ignoring human rights and demeaning refugees.</p >
